title: Oyo snaps up US chain Motel 6 in $525 million all-cash deal, eyes overseas expansion
description: OYO, the travel tech platform, is set to acquire American budget hotel chain Motel 6 and Studio 6 brands from Blackstone Real Estate for USD 525 million. The acquisition aims to expand OYO's presence in the US. The deal is expected to close in the fourth quarter of 2024, subject to customary conditions.
